birth_place.zh-cn: 河北省武强县孙庄乡北堤南村
birth_place.en: Beitinan Village, Sunzhuang Township, Wuqiang County, Hebei Province

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，曾任中央军事委员会委员、中国人民解放军总政治部末任主任、中央军事委员会政治工作部首任主任。因涉郭伯雄、徐才厚案被调查，后在家中自缢身亡，并被开除党籍和军籍。
description.en: A general (Shang Jiang) in the People's Liberation Army (PLA) of China. He served as a member of the Central Military Commission, the last director of the PLA General Political Department, and the first director of the Political Work Department of the Central Military Commission. He was investigated for his involvement in the cases of Guo Boxiong and Xu Caihou, and later committed suicide at home. He was posthumously expelled from the Communist Party of China and the military.

nodes.id: 中央军事委员会政治工作部

zh-cn: 中央军事委员会政治工作部
en: Political Work Department of the Central Military Commission

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央军事委员会和中华人民共和国中央军事委员会的政治工作机关，由原中国人民解放军总政治部改组而来。
description.en: The political work organ of the Central Military Commission of the Communist Party of China and the Central Military Commission of the People's Republic of China, reorganized from the former PLA General Political Department.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军总政治部

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军总政治部
en: General Political Department of the People's Liberation Army

description.zh-cn: 原中国共产党中央军事委员会和中华人民共和国中央军事委员会负责军队政治工作的机关，后改组为中央军事委员会政治工作部。
description.en: The former organ responsible for the political work of the armed forces under the Central Military Commission of the Communist Party of China and the Central Military Commission of the People's Republic of China, later reorganized into the Political Work Department of the Central Military Commission.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军广州军区

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军广州军区
en: Guangzhou Military Region of the People's Liberation Army

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军曾在中国南部设立的大军区。
description.en: A former military region of the People's Liberation Army located in Southern China.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军国防大学

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军国防大学

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的最高军事学府。
description.en: The highest military academy of the People's Liberation Army.

en: Central Party School of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会直属的培养党员领导干部和理论干部的学校。
description.en: An institution of higher education that specifically trains officials for the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军陆军第四十二集团军

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军第四十二集团军

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军一个曾隶属南部战区的集团军，于2017年撤编。
description.en: A former group army of the PLA Ground Force under the Southern Theater Command, which was disbanded in 2017.

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央军事委员会
中华人民共和国中央军事委员会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高国家军事领导机关。
description.en: The highest national military command and control institution of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and sole ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，曾任中央军事委员会副主席。因腐败问题被调查并判处无期徒刑。
description.en: A former general of the People's Liberation Army of China who served as a Vice Chairman of the Central Military Commission. He was investigated for corruption and sentenced to life in prison.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，曾任中央军事委员会副主席、总政治部主任。因腐败问题被调查，在调查期间因病死亡。
description.en: A former general of the People's Liberation Army of China who served as a Vice Chairman of the Central Military Commission and Director of the General Political Department. He was investigated for corruption and died of illness during the investigation.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，曾任总政治部主任，是张阳的直接前任。
description.en: A general of the People's Liberation Army of China, who served as Director of the General Political Department and was Zhang Yang's immediate predecessor.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，接替张阳担任中央军委政治工作部主任。
description.en: An admiral (Shang Jiang) of the People's Liberation Army of China, who succeeded Zhang Yang as the Director of the Political Work Department of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，曾任中央军委联合参谋部参谋长，与张阳同时期落马。
description.en: A former general of the People's Liberation Army of China, who served as the Chief of the Joint Staff Department of the Central Military Commission and was investigated around the same time as Zhang Yang.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会
en: Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的中央领导机构。
description.en: The central leading body of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国河北省衡水市下辖的一个县，是张阳的出生地。
description.en: A county under the administration of Hengshui, Hebei, China. It is the birthplace of Zhang Yang.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的首都，是张阳的逝世地。
description.en: The capital of the People's Republic of China, and the place of Zhang Yang's death.

nodes.id: 中共中央关于张阳严重违纪违法问题及自缢死亡情况的通报

zh-cn: 中共中央关于张阳严重违纪违法问题及自缢死亡情况的通报

description.zh-cn: 中共中央就张阳严重违纪违法问题及其自杀情况向党内发布的通报文件。
description.en: A circular issued by the Central Committee of the CPC to party members regarding Zhang Yang's severe violations of discipline and law, and his suicide.

relationships.target: 中央军事委员会政治工作部

description.zh-cn: 张阳担任新组建的中央军事委员会政治工作部首任主任。
description.en: Zhang Yang served as the first director of the newly established Political Work Department of the Central Military Commission.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军总政治部

description.zh-cn: 张阳担任中国人民解放军总政治部主任。
description.en: Zhang Yang served as the Director of the General Political Department of the People's Liberation Army.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军广州军区

description.zh-cn: 张阳曾任中国人民解放军广州军区政治委员。
description.en: Zhang Yang served as the Political Commissar of the Guangzhou Military Region.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军广州军区

description.zh-cn: 张阳曾任中国人民解放军广州军区政治部主任。
description.en: Zhang Yang served as the Director of the Political Department of the Guangzhou Military Region.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军陆军第四十二集团军

description.zh-cn: 张阳曾任中国人民解放军陆军第四十二集团军政治委员。
description.en: Zhang Yang served as the Political Commissar of the 42nd Group Army of the PLA Ground Force.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军陆军第四十二集团军

description.zh-cn: 张阳曾任中国人民解放军陆军第四十二集团军政治部主任。
description.en: Zhang Yang served as the Director of the Political Department of the 42nd Group Army of the PLA Ground Force.

description.zh-cn: 张阳曾任中国共产党和中华人民共和国中央军事委员会委员。
description.en: Zhang Yang served as a member of the Central Military Commission of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 张阳于1969年5月加入中国共产党，2018年10月16日被开除党籍。
description.en: Zhang Yang joined the Communist Party of China in May 1969 and was expelled from the party on October 16, 2018.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军国防大学

description.zh-cn: 张阳于1991年10月进入中国人民解放军国防大学基本系学习，为期一年。
description.en: In October 1991, Zhang Yang began a one-year course of study in the Basic Department of the PLA National Defence University.

description.zh-cn: 张阳于1996年毕业于中共中央党校行政管理专业。
description.en: Zhang Yang graduated from the Central Party School with a major in Public Administration in 1996.

description.zh-cn: 张阳出生于河北省武强县。
description.en: Zhang Yang was born in Wuqiang County, Hebei Province.

description.zh-cn: 张阳因涉及郭伯雄等案问题线索而被中央军委调查，最终导致其自杀身亡。
description.en: Zhang Yang was investigated by the Central Military Commission for his involvement in cases related to Guo Boxiong, which ultimately led to his suicide.

description.zh-cn: 张阳因涉及徐才厚等案问题线索而被中央军委调查，最终导致其自杀身亡。
description.en: Zhang Yang was investigated by the Central Military Commission for his involvement in cases related to Xu Caihou, which ultimately led to his suicide.

description.zh-cn: 张阳于2012年10月接替李继耐担任中国人民解放军总政治部主任。
description.en: In October 2012, Zhang Yang succeeded Li Jinai as the Director of the General Political Department of the PLA.

description.zh-cn: 2017年9月，苗华接替张阳担任中央军委政治工作部主任。
description.en: In September 2017, Miao Hua succeeded Zhang Yang as the Director of the Political Work Department of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 两人同为中央军委委员，于2017年8月几乎同时接受组织调查并从公众视线中消失。
description.en: Both were members of the Central Military Commission and disappeared from public view around the same time in August 2017 after being placed under investigation.

relationships.source: 中国共产党中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 中共中央批准对张阳进行组织谈话并调查，最终于2018年10月16日决定开除其党籍。
description.en: The Central Committee of the CPC approved the investigation into Zhang Yang, and ultimately decided to expel him from the party on October 16, 2018.

description.zh-cn: 中央军委决定对张阳进行组织谈话、调查核实其问题线索，并最终开除其军籍、取消其上将军衔。
description.en: The Central Military Commission decided to investigate Zhang Yang, which led to his expulsion from the military and the revocation of his general rank.

relationships.source: 中共中央关于张阳严重违纪违法问题及自缢死亡情况的通报

description.zh-cn: 该通报于2017年11月29日起在中共党内传达，正式公布了张阳的违纪违法问题和自杀情况，标志着其政治生命的终结。
description.en: Starting from November 29, 2017, this circular was distributed within the CPC, officially announcing Zhang Yang's disciplinary violations, illegal activities, and suicide, marking the end of his political life.
